Plot: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.
Title: The Jungle Book 2
Writer: Karl Geurs (screenplay), Carter Crocker (additional written material), Evan Spiliotopoulos (additional written material), David Reynolds (additional written material), Roger S.H. Schulman (additional written material), Tom Rogers (additional written material)
Actors: John Goodman, Haley Joel Osment, Mae Whitman, Connor Funk
tomatoConsensus: This inferior rehash of The Jungle Book should have gone straight to video.
